help.title: Reset App
help.blurb1: If you are experiencing problems, you can reset the app to its factory settings. You will be logged out.
help.blurb2: This will NOT delete any of your data. All your shifts and contracts will remain untouched.

hero.text: Clock allows you to easily edit your time sheets on your mobile device or PC.

blurb1.title: Start-and-Go! Just do your work.
blurb1.text: Simply start your shift with the clock button and close your browser. You can clock out on any device later if your work is done.

blurb2.title: Forgot to clock? No problem!
blurb2.text: Past shifts can easily be added. All shifts can be edited or even deleted - you decide which shifts will be printed on your time sheet!

logout.message: You can come back later at any time.
logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?

setupData.text: Um Clock sofort nutzen zu können kannst du direkt einen Vertrag erstellen und deine Personalnummer speichern.

underConstruction.text: We value your feedback. We are continuously exploring new functionality for Clock. Do not hesitate to contact us.
underConstruction.title: Under construction

welcome.text: You are new here, huh? We need to get a few things done, before you can start using Clock. We will guide you through the process!
welcome.title: @:app.onboarding

1.title: What is Clock?
1.text: Clock is an online tool to help you register your worktime and generate your monthly Time Sheets. You control all of your data and you decide when your Time Sheet is ready to be turned in.

2.title: Contracts
2.text: A Contract is a virtual duplicate of your real contract and should have the same runtime and the same work hours. If you have more than one Job, you can create additional Contracts and clock your worktime separately.

3.title: Shifts
3.text: A consecutive worktime is called "Shift". You can clock Shifts directly in real time on the Dashboard or you can add them manually and schedule Shifts in advance. Scheduled Shifts must be reviewed when they are past.

4.title: The Dashboard
4.text: The Clock Dashboard features the "Clock in" button and displays useful information about your Shifts and work time. You will receive a warning if your Shifts overlap or if you forgot to clock out.

5.title: Calendar and Shift Table
5.text: You can view and edit all your past and future Shifts either in the Calendar view or in the Shift Table. The Shift Table also displays additional information about your Shifts like Notes and Tags.

6.title: Generate a Time Sheet
6.text: At the end of a month you can generate a Time Sheet with all Shifts summed up for every day of the current month. You can download your Time Sheet and turn it in at your supervisor's office.

personnelNumber.noPersonnelNumberSaved: Um einen Stundenzettel zu erstellen musst du deine Personalnummer eingeben. Solltest du deine Personalnummer noch nicht wissen, kannst du sie auch vor dem Download deines ersten Stundenzettels eingeben.
personnelNumber.personnelNumberSaved: Du hast deine Personalnummer bereits gespeichert
personnelNumber.title: Save Personnrlnumber
personnelNumber.hint: You can find your personnel number on your salary printout.
personnelNumber.label: Personnel number
personnelNumber.changeInfo: Your personnel number should is independent of your contract(s) and should not change.
personnelNumber.changeConfirmText: Are you sure you want to change it?

privacyagreement.text: You have to accept the {privacyAgreement} before using Clock.
privacyagreement.checkbox: I have read and agree with the privacy policy.
privacyagreement.revokeInfo: The agreement can be revoked by deleting your account.

reports.exportAlert: Once you generate the report, you will not be able to add or update shifts in the corresponding month

hints.request: You can request and subsequently download your months report for review. You cannot request a report for the current month before locking the report for previous month of the same contract.
hints.personnelnumber: You will also have to supply your personnel number.
hints.lock: You can only lock the month after generating the report for review.

lock.label: Lock this month
lock.message: After locking this month, you will not be able to edit its shifts. The locking of a month cannot be undone.

warnings.maxOvertimeExceeded: You gathered more than 50% of you debit worktime in overtime. Only 50% of you debit worktime will be carried over to the next month as surplus hours.
warnings.insufficientWorktime: You are missing more than 20% of your debit worktime. Only 20% of your debit worktime will be carried over to the next month as undertime hours.

selectContract.hint: Change the contract to see different data.
selectContract.hintExpired: This contract has expired. Change the contract to see different data.

account.dialogText: Please enter your email address {email} to confirm.
account.text: You can delete you account at any time. This will purge all the data we keep on record for you. Please remember that this action is permanent and not reversible! You can create a new account afterwards.

language.text: Changing the language will take effect immediately.

shifts.reviewed: The shift has taken place. I reviewed the data for correctness.
shifts.reviewErrorPast: A past shift must be reviewed before saving.
shifts.reviewErrorFuture: A future shift cannot be saved as "reviewed".
shifts.reviewErrorLive: A running shift can not be reviewed before its end.

tags.createHint: No results matching "{search}". Press {enter} to create a new one

types.label: What category does this shift fall into?

shifts.wasExportedAlert: The report for this shift was already exported. This shift cannot be edited anymore.

table.pastShiftsHint: Clocked shifts and shifts manually entered with past dates are considered as "reviewed".
table.futureShiftsHint: All shifts scheduled for the future.

warnings.selectedDateIsHoliday: The selected date is a bank holiday. You can only create shifts of type "bank holiday" on this day.
warnings.sickOrVacationShiftExists: There are other shifts of type {shiftType} on this date. You can only create shifts of the same type.
warnings.noSickOrVacationWithRegularShift: There is already a normal shift on this date. Please delete the shift or change its type before creating a shift of type {shiftType}.
warnings.insufficientBreaktime: There are shifts of {worktime}h with breaks of {breaktime}h on this date. According to §4 ArbzG, the work shall be interrupted by breaks of 30 minutes for a shift over 6h, and 45 minutes for a shift over 9h (in all).
warnings.maxWorktimeExceeded: You exceeded your maximum daily worktime of 10h.
warnings.maxShifttimeExceeded: This shift exceeds the maximum shift length of 6h.
warnings.shiftIsOverlapping: This Shift overlaps with another already existing shift.
warnings.concatenatedShiftTooLong: This shift is concatenated with other shifts and they are in total to long (max 6h).
warnings.faqLinking: For further information on the displayed error messages please check the FAQ.

errors.startedBeforeStopped: The start must be before the end of the shift.

faq.text: Please refer to the {link} for further information.
